txt_en: You never lose that childlike innocence.
txt_cn: 永葆童心。

txt_en: Don't get lost.
txt_cn: 不要迷茫，不要彷徨。

txt_en: Smile and the world smiles with you.
txt_cn: 微笑吧，世界也会跟着你微笑。

txt_en: It is love that will heal you.
txt_cn: 爱会治愈你。

txt_en: There is no courage without fear.
txt_cn: 心有畏惧，方生勇气。

txt_en: When one door closes, another one opens.
txt_cn: 上天关上一扇门，同时会为你开启另一扇窗。

txt_en: Sometimes a little discomfort in the beginning can save a whole lot of pain down the road.
txt_cn: 有时起初的小小不悦，可以省去日后的诸多苦痛。

txt_en: There is nothing quite like the sweet scented smell of success.
txt_cn: 成功的美妙滋味无与伦比。

txt_en: We must fight together.
txt_cn: 我们要并肩作战。

txt_en: Life is full of possibilities.
txt_cn: 人生有无限可能。

txt_en: You can't change the past.
txt_cn: 往事不可追。

txt_en: Family means nobody gets left behind.
txt_cn: 一家人就是要整整齐齐。

txt_en: Any choice can be the right one, so long as you willingly embrace it.
txt_cn: 只要是心之所向，任何选择都是正确的。

txt_en: Don't let shame about your past cloud your future.
txt_cn: 别让过去的阴霾遮蔽未来。

txt_en: Good deeds are the seeds to good actions.
txt_cn: 善行激发善举。

txt_en: The world has so much to offer.
txt_cn: 这个世界精彩纷呈。

txt_en: Not being heard is no reason for silence.
txt_cn: 不被倾听不是沉默的理由。

txt_en: My dad gave me unconditional love.
txt_cn: 父亲给了我无条件的爱。

txt_en: We define ourselves by our actions.
txt_cn: 我们应用行动定义自己。

txt_en: Fortune often favors the bold.
txt_cn: 命运向来眷顾勇者。

txt_en: It's going to be a beautiful summer.
txt_cn: 这将是个美好的夏天。

txt_en: Wishing you peace and health for Dragon Boat Festival.
txt_cn: 愿你端午安康。

txt_en: We can do anything we want if we really want to.
txt_cn: 只要心有所愿，一切皆可实现。

txt_en: The world is full of surprises.
txt_cn: 这世界充满了惊喜与意外。

txt_en: Nothing in the world can take the place of persistence.
txt_cn: 坚持是这世上独一无二的品格。
